channel.title: Posts on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Creat another blog and publish
item.description: Creat a new blog Hugo hugo new post/blog01.md vi blog01.md hugo –theme=dream –baseUrl=“https://crazysandwich4github.github.io/" –buildDrafts Git git status . -s git add . git commit -m “creat a new blog” git push Publish blog Github Creat a new branch named YOURGITHUBNAME.github.io Git git remote add origin https://github.com/YOURGITHUBNAME/YOURGITHUBNAME.github.io.git git push -u origin master

item.title: Using hugo build my first blog
item.description: Using hugo build my first blog hugo 1.download hugo https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo/releases 2.cmd input: hugo new site myblog 3.download themes themes.gohugo.io 4.hugo server -t simplicity –buildDrafts 5.hugo new post/blog.md git for windows git config –list git config user.name git config user.email
